attributes.action: take into account the many dangers of nuclear power when considering whether to build more nuclear power stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't, to be honest, know whether a decision on this has already been taken; obviously I hope it hasn't so that this petition can be considered. The dangers include: the connection between nuclear power and nuclear weapons, the possibility of terrorists stealing the raw materials, and deaths caused by nuclear waste etc.  I find it incredible that, 11 years after Chernobyl, nuclear power is even still on the agenda!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
